name: Last Man Alive (Josh Montague)
description:
Last Man Alive (Prototype)

Stranded on the last patch of unclaimed territory, you know there is no way out from the zombie apocalypse, but that doesn’t mean that you’re giving up. If you’re going down, you’re going down fighting as long as you can. Attack the zombie horde with all your might and never give up, for it is an honor to die a soldier’s death as the last human alive!

Rules:

Survive waves of Zombies for as long as you can!

Controls:

arrow keys = move player

mouse = rotate vision

left click = shoot gun
